titleStmt.title: The same hand again, against the present councel of state's bad friends, John Canne, and his maintainers, the connivers of those very licentious, scandalous books, called the Discoverer, Part the first, and second.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: John Canne's The discoverer, part 1 and 2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
